notes: Prisma client uses postinstall for one of the few valid reasons. It compiles your typed DB client based on your schema file. See https://blog.sandworm.dev/dissecting-npm-malware-five-packages-and-their-evil-install-scripts#heading-when-are-install-scripts-useful
Prisma engines uses the postinstall script to download binaries appropriate for the target machine. See https://www.npmjs.com/package/@prisma/engines
